actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend section 2 of the act of April 14, 1910, relating to railway safety appliances, to require reflecting devices or materials as a safety measure on all railroad cars, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires reflecting devices measuring at least four inches in height as a safety measure on all railroad cars to be used at any point on a railroad line where there is a grade crossing.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 2 of the act of April 14, 1910, relating to railway safety appliances, to require reflecting devices or materials as a safety measure on all railroad cars, and for other purposes.
